sentences.en: Abe Marie is a postgraduate student from Berkeley University in the US who has been working with the company as part of her ethnomusicology research.
sentences.cn: 美国柏克莱大学研究生安倍玛利亚，在这个公司上班，也从事人种音乐学的研究。

trans.tran_cn: 民族音乐学（尤指非欧罗巴民族的）
trans.tran_en: the study of the music of different cultures
